findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions includeInReward() and _getCurrentSupply() use loops to find and remove addresses from the _excluded list and evaluate total supply, respectively. These functions may be aborted with an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long excluded addresses list.

findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges to change tax, charity and liquidity fee, maximum transaction amount, exclude from fee, lock and unlock, which can be used to retake privileges even after ownership was renounced.
